arts.ttl: Repubblica: ‘Game of 9s’ – San Siro sub-plot emerges as Milan and Roma explore swap
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher A fascinating sub-plot could be played out during AC Milan’s game against Roma, and it involves two struggling strikers. As La Repubblica (via MilanNews) report this morning, there is a mercato flavour to the game at San Siro tonight. arts.ttl: Here’s what Allegri is asking from his Milan team ahead of Roma fixture
arts.sum: The injury crisis cannot be used as an excuse, especially since Massimiliano Allegri himself refuses to treat it as one. He believes his team is strong and, above all, well-prepared to handle a season like this without European competitions. Some mistakes have been made, particularly in the number of available outfield players, but January will […]

arts.ttl: AC Milan vs Roma: a Scudetto showdown
arts.sum: There have been 101 official matches between the two teams at San Siro, with Milan winning 53 (the last 3-1 in last year`s Coppa Italia), 26 draws (the last 1-1 in last year`s Serie A) and Roma winning 22 (the last 1-0 in the 2023/24 Europa League). AC Milan will host Roma at San Siro on Sunday at 20:45 CET.

arts.ttl: Gazzetta: Milan’s Leao and Nkunku vs Roma’s Soulé and Dybala
arts.sum: Milan vs Roma is a great classic of Italian football, one of the most anticipated matches of the season, full of individual duels. Think of the tactical battle between Massimiliano Allegri and Gian Piero Gasperini, or the head-to-head between goalkeepers Maignan and Svilar, and the contest on the wings between Saelemaekers and Wesley.
